articles.description: A black-footed ferret kit was born around 3 PM yesterday at the Smithsonian‚Äôs Conservation Biology Institute in Front Royal, Virginia. Animal care staff are monitoring mom, Potpie, for additional kits born in the litter.This is the third litter for Potpie, and the third litter for dad Daly.
articles.title: An Adorable Black-Footed Ferret Kit Was Born at a Smithsonian Institute - Washingtonian

articles.description: Video Carnivore keepers at the Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute (SCBI) in Front Royal, Virginia, are welcoming a litter of endangered black-footed ferret kits. Three-year-old female Potpie has birthed one kit already, which was born at 3:41 p.m. and can be viewed via the Black-Footed Ferret Cam. Animal care staff are closely monitoring the soundless, black-and-white‚Ä¶
articles.title: Black-Footed Ferrets Are Born at the Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute - Smithsonian's National Zoo and Conservation Biology Institute
